Replacement of private key is the problem that ANT can it log in to account due to lack of understanding of block chain, unskilled operation and improper preservation of private key. Second, it develops the function of account and private key reset.


		When the user loses the private key and cannot log in to the account, after specific verification, the system will import the account data of version 1.0 from the previous server and reset the account password and private key for the user.


		Note: Since the previous server only records ANT asset data, only ANT-related assets can be restored after reset. Other assets, including but not limited to ETH, will be lost permanently. Therefore, the majority of users are requested to operate cautiously and keep their private keys and passwords in order to avoid property losses.

With the arrival of Chinese traditional Spring Festival, the function of ANT red packet is officially launched!
 		Partners can use their assets to send red packet to relatives and friends, send wishes and bring good luck!
 		This year is Festival does not accept gifts, only accept ANT.
 		Regional red packet: Select a province, city, region, input the number of assets, click Send to let all members of the region through ANT shake to receive your blessing red packet.The sending areared packet is limited to 2000 assets each time, and the maximum daily delivery is no more than 10,000 assets; the regional red packet is not more than 2000 assets per day.
 		Ordinary red packet: After entering the ANT account of relatives and friends, input the amount of assets, you can send blessings and good luck to relatives and friends in the form of red packet.A single ordinary red packet cannot exceed 100 assets, and the upper limit is 1000 assets per day; the ordinary red packet cannot exceed 1000 assets per day.
For the sake of your asset security, please read the following agreements carefully!
I have read and understood the protocol and am willing to follow it.
Please answer the following questions. All the questions are single-choice.
1. The private key is your only identity certificate on the chain. If the private key loses or forgets the private key password, it will not be retrieved in any way.
Private keys are generated by "elliptic curve encryption algorithm" with the computing power of ordinary computers. If the private keys are lost, they will not be retrieved.
After the loss, you can use the mobile phone number and verification code to retrieve.
2. The private key created in ANT Token can be retrieved by contacting customer service, providing mobile phone number, verification code and wallet address if I accidentally lose it?
Unable to retrieve, all the private keys used in ANT Token are computed from the devices used in user generation. As a decentralized app, ANT Token does not backup any user is private keys.
Yes, it can be retrieved through the ANT Private Key Security Center.
3. Is the conceptual description between private key, public key and address correct?
Private key, public key and address can be converted at will. If one of them is known, the other two can be deduced.

A private key can correspond to multiple public keys, and each public key can correspond to an address. The address is converted by some mathematical logic transformation of the public key. When the other party knows the address or the public key, the private key and the address can not be deduced. If the other party knows the private key, the public key and the address can be deduced.
When sending a transaction, the sender only needs to provide the signature of the public key to complete the issue of the transaction or the transfer of assets.
4. What will happen if the user accidentally loses his private key?

Losing the private key becomes equivalent to losing the unique credentials. All assets in the address corresponding to the private key will be lost permanently. There is no way to transfer and trade. Nor can assets be recovered by any external means.
Without any consequences, a new private key and address can be generated and the assets can be transferred.
5. If the user publishes the public key, will there be any privacy leak?
It can query the identity of the holder corresponding to the address on the corresponding "block browser" or obtain the real information of the user through other means such as "human flesh search".

Block chains have the characteristics of "anonymity". There is no way to know the real information of the user who holds the address assets except that the user publicly acknowledges and proves that the private key of an address belongs to himself. There is absolutely no need to worry about privacy disclosure.
Start creating a new private key
Unfortunately! Failed to pass the test
· Passwords are used to protect private keys and transaction authorization. Strength is very important
·ANT Token does not store passwords, nor can it help you find them. Please remember

Do not transfer Keystore files through network tools. Once acquired by hackers, it will cause irreparable loss of assets.
For online storage, it is recommended that Keystore be saved using password-keeping software with higher security level.

Respected user:
 				Thank you for choosing the ANT Token service. The ANT Token Service Agreement (hereinafter referred to as "this Agreement") is signed by the ANT Foundation (hereinafter referred to as "the Foundation" or "us") and the User (hereinafter referred to as "you" or "User"). This Agreement is between you and There is legal effect on the contract between the foundations.
 				We hereby remind you that before using ANT Token (hereafter referred to as “ANT Token” or “Software”), please read the “ANT Token Service Agreement” and the related agreements mentioned below to ensure that you fully understand this agreement. Terms and conditions, and consider the risks autonomously.
 I. Confirmation and acceptance of this agreement
 1. You understand that this Agreement and related agreements apply to Decentralized Applications ("DApp") (excluding third-party developed DApps) developed and owned by the Foundation on ANT Token and ANT Token.
 2. By downloading the ANT Token Software and creating or importing the Wallet, you are deemed to have fully read and accepted all the terms of this Agreement. This Agreement is effective immediately and is binding on both parties.
 3. This Agreement may be updated by the Foundation at any time. Once the revised agreement is published on ANT Token, it will automatically take effect without further notice. After we announce the terms of the revised agreement, if you do not accept the revised terms, please stop using ANT Token immediately, and your continued use of ANT Token will be deemed to accept the revised agreement.
 4. If you are under the age of 18, or have no civil capacity or restricted capacity, use ANT Token under the direction of your parent or guardian.
 II.The definition
 1ANT Token: refers to the blockchain wallet developed by the Foundation based on the Ethereum single-chain system (and other blockchain systems supported in the future), including other auxiliary tools developed to facilitate the user to use the blockchain system.
 2. User:
 	(1) The user must be a natural person with full civil capacity;
 	(2) If you use the ANT Token service for minors under the age of 18, you will need to use ANT Token under the direction of your parent or guardian. ANT Token reserves the right to ask you and your parent or guardian to be responsible for any consequences of the use of ANT Token or a person with limited capacity to conduct a transaction beyond the scope of his or her civil rights or capacity.
 3. Safety Test Questionnaire: Before you use ANT Token (and in the future use process), you need to pass the safety test questionnaire to prove that you understand the blockchain technology and knowledge, and have the basics of rational use and management of the decentralized wallet. ability.
 4. Create or import a wallet: Refers to the process of using ANT Token to confirm the fulfillment of this agreement and to create or import a wallet.
 5. Wallet password: refers to the password that you are prompted to fill out during the process of creating an ANT Token wallet. The password is used to encrypt and protect the private key. As a decentralized app, the wallet password is not stored on your mobile device or our server. Once lost, you will need to reset the new password with a clear text private key or mnemonic.
 6. Information prompt: The information prompt content involved in the ANT Token software operation interface, it is recommended that the user follow the relevant steps.
 7. Specific users: Users who must cooperate with us in fulfilling their personal information disclosure obligations in accordance with laws, regulations and policies.
 8. Private key: consists of 256-bit random characters, which is the core of the user is own and use of digital tokens.
 9. Public key: Generated by the private key by means of cryptography, and used to generate the blockchain digital wallet address. The digital wallet address is the public collection address.
 10. Mnemonic: Complies with the blockchain BIP39 industry standard, consisting of 12 (or 15/18/21/24) ordered words generated by a random algorithm. It is an easy-to-record expression of the private key, which is convenient for users to backup and keep.
 11. Keystore: is a file format in which the private key or mnemonic is encrypted and encrypted by the user-set wallet password. It is only stored on your mobile device and will not be synchronized to the Fusion Server.
 12. Digital Token: Refers to the types of digital tokens currently supported by ANT Token, including but not limited to ANT.
 13. Information: refers to articles such as “Browse” and “Market” on ANT Token. These materials are owned by the Foundation and may not be reproduced without authorization.
 14. Personal Information: Any information recorded electronically or otherwise that can identify the user is personal identity, either alone or in combination with other information, including but not limited to the name of the natural person, date of birth, ID number, personal biometric information, address , phone number, bank card number, email address, wallet address, mobile device information, operation history, transaction history, etc., but does not include the user is wallet password, private key, mnemonic, Keystore.
 III.The service content
 1. Create or import a wallet. For digital tokens supported by ANT Token, you can use ANT Token to generate a new wallet or import a compatible wallet generated by other wallet tools in the relevant blockchain system.
 2. Transfer, collection. You can use the transfer and collection function of ANT Token to manage digital tokens, that is, use the private key for electronic signature and modify the ledger of the relevant blockchain. Transfer means that the payer uses the blockchain address of the payee to perform the transfer operation. The actual transfer and collection behaviors occur in the relevant blockchain system (not ANT Token).
 3. Quotes view. You can use ANT Token to view the digital token exchange rate prices provided. ANT Token captures the corresponding digital token exchange rate information and displays it in the "Market" section of the ANT Token.
 4. Manage digital assets. You can use ANT Token to add, keep, and remove digital tokens supported by ANT Token.
 5. Browse the DApp. Through the link on the ANT Token, the user can jump to the DApp and use the services provided by the DApp (including our own DApp and third-party DApp).
 6. Transaction history. We will copy all or part of your transaction history through the blockchain system. However, the transaction records are subject to the records of the blockchain system.
 7. Suspend service. You know that based on the "irrevocable" nature of the blockchain system transaction, we cannot suspend or cancel the transfer transaction, etc., but under certain circumstances, we can suspend or restrict the operation of a user to the ANT Token software.
 8. Other services that we think are necessary.
 Users should be aware of the following common issues when accepting the above services we provide:
 1. Adhering to the decentralization of the blockchain, and in order to protect the digital token security of users, we provide decentralized services, which are greatly different from banking financial institutions. Users understand that we do not provide the following services:
 	(1) store the user is wallet password (that is, the password set when the user creates/imports the wallet), the private key, the mnemonic, and the Keystore;
 	(2) Retrieve the user is wallet password, private key, mnemonic, Keystore;
 	(3) freezing the wallet;
 	(4) Lost the wallet;
 	(5) Restoring the wallet;
 	(6) The transaction is rolled back.
 2. Since we do not provide the above services, users should keep their own mobile devices with ANT Token, backup ANT Token, backup wallet password, mnemonic, private key and Keystore. If the user loses the mobile device, deletes and does not back up the ANT Token, deletes and does not back up the wallet, the wallet is stolen or forgotten the wallet password, private key, mnemonic, Keystore, we are unable to restore the wallet or retrieve the wallet password, private key, Mnemonic, Keystore; if the user mishandles the transaction (such as the wrong transfer address), we can not cancel the transaction.
 3. The Digital Token Management Service that the Foundation and ANT Token can provide does not include all existing digital tokens. Do not operate any digital tokens that are not supported by ANT Token through ANT Token.
 4. ANT Token is only the user is digital token management tool, not an exchange or trading platform. Although this Agreement will refer to “transactions” many times, its behavior generally refers to the transfer and collection operations performed by users using ANT Token, which is fundamentally different from “transactions” conducted on exchanges or trading platforms.
 5. The DApp integrated on ANT Token includes our own DApp and DApp provided by third-party platforms. For DApps provided by third-party platforms, ANT Token only provides blockchain browsers for users to enter DApp. Before accepting services or conducting transactions on a third-party DApp, users should judge and evaluate whether the services or transactions provided by the third-party DApp are at risk.
 IV. Your rights and obligations
 	(1) Create or import a wallet
 1. Create or import a wallet: You have the right to create and/or import a wallet via ANT Token on your mobile device, have the right to set the wallet is wallet password and other information, and have the right to use your own wallet via the ANT Token app. Transfers and collections are performed on the blockchain.
 2. Authentication: In accordance with relevant laws, regulations and policies, certain users should complete relevant authentication in accordance with the ANT Token prompt when using the related services provided by ANT Token, and ask you to submit including but not limited to your name and ID card. Personal information such as number, mobile number, and bank card number information. Otherwise, the specific user will not be able to use the service, and the loss caused by the delay of the specific user is at your own risk.
 3. We may develop different software versions for different terminal devices. You should choose to download the appropriate version for installation according to actual needs. If you obtain the software or the installation program with the same name as the software from a third party that is not legally authorized, we cannot guarantee the normal use of the software or the security of the software, and the damage is at your own risk.
 4. After the new version of the software is released, the old version of the software may not be available. We do not guarantee the security of the old software, continue to provide usability and provide corresponding customer service. Please check and download the latest version at any time.
 	(2) use
 1. Users should keep their own mobile devices, wallet passwords, private keys, mnemonics, Keystore and other information. We are not responsible for keeping the above information for our users. You are solely responsible for any risks, liabilities, losses, and expenses incurred as a result of your loss of mobile devices, active or passive disclosure, forgotten wallet passwords, private keys, mnemonics, Keystore or other attacks, fraud, etc.
 2. Follow the information prompts. You understand and agree to follow the information prompts that ANT Token has made to you, and follow the information prompts. Otherwise, all risks, liabilities, losses, expenses, etc. caused by you shall be borne by you.
 3. You understand and understand that ANT Token is not obligated to perform due diligence obligations on linked third-party DApp services or transactions, and you should make investment decisions and assume the corresponding investment risks.
 4. Actively complete the authentication. When ANT Token reasonably believes that your trading behavior or trading situation is abnormal, or that your identity information is suspect, or ANT Token believes that you should check your identity documents or other necessary documents, please actively cooperate with ANT Token to check Your valid ID or other necessary documents will complete the relevant authentication in a timely manner.
 5. Transfer.
 	(1) You are aware of the daily transfer limit and number of pens you can use for the ANT Token service, possibly due to the country in which you use the transfer service, regulatory requirements, transfer purposes, ANT Token risk control, authentication Waiting for something different.
 	(2) You understand the "irrevocable" attribute based on blockchain operation. When you use the ANT Token transfer function, you should bear the consequences of your operation errors (including but not limited to the wrong transfer address, Your own choice to transfer the node server).
 	(3) You are aware that when using the ANT Token service, the following circumstances may result in a transfer "transaction failure" or "package timeout":
 		a) insufficient wallet balance;
 		b) insufficient transaction miners;
 		c) the blockchain execution contract code failed;
 		d) exceed the payment amount specified by the regulatory authorities, ANT Token or laws and regulations;
 		e) technical failures such as networks and equipment;
 		f) The blockchain network is congested, faults, etc., causing the transaction to be abandoned;
 		g) Your address or counterparty address is identified as a special address, such as a high-risk address, an exchange address, an ICO address, a Token address, and so on.
 	(4) You know that ANT Token only provides you with the transfer tool. After you use ANT Token to complete the transfer, we have fulfilled all the obligations of the current service. We do not bear any obligations for other disputes.
 6. Legal compliance. You know that when you operate with ANT Token or when you use the DApp on ANT Token, you should follow the relevant laws and regulations and national policies.
 7. Announcement notice. ANT Token will send you notifications by means of website announcements, emails, text messages, phone calls, message center messages, pop-up reminders or client notifications, such as notifying you of the progress of the transaction or prompting you to do so. Pay attention to it.
 8. Service fees and tax obligations:
 	(1) ANT Token will not charge you any service fees or handling fees for the time being, and will be agreed or announced in the future when certain services are charged.
 	(2) You should pay the miner is fee when you use ANT Token for transfer. The amount is up to you. Miners fees are charged by the relevant blockchain system;
 	(3) You know that under certain circumstances, because your environment and network status are unstable, your transfer operation will not be completed, and the miners will be charged by the relevant blockchain system;
 	(4) You are responsible for all taxable and other expenses incurred by you for trading in ANT Token.
 V.Risk tips
 1. You understand and understand that due to the fact that the laws, regulations and policies in the field of digital tokens are not yet sound, digital tokens in this field may have significant risks such as unfulfillable and technical instability. And the price fluctuation of digital tokens is much higher than other financial assets. We caution you to rationally choose to hold or dispose of any type of digital token based on your financial situation and risk appetite. The market view function provided by ANT Token only captures the search results of the digital token exchange rate information of some exchanges, and does not indicate the latest market or best offer.
 2. When using the ANT Token service, if you or your counterparty fails to comply with the operation instructions or rules in this agreement or related website description, transaction, payment page, ANT Token does not guarantee the completion of the transaction, and ANT Token does not Responsibility for damages. In the event that the foregoing occurs and the funds have been credited to your or your counterparty is ANT Token wallet or third party wallet, you understand the “irreversible” nature of the blockchain operation and the “unreversible” characteristics of the relevant transaction. You and your counterparts bear the corresponding risk consequences.
 3. When you use ANT Token integrated third-party DApp services or conduct transactions, for your benefit, we recommend that you carefully read this agreement and ANT Token tips, understand the transaction object and product information, and carefully assess the risk before taking action. All transactions you make in a third-party DApp are your personal actions, and a binding contractual relationship is established between you and your opposing party, regardless of ANT Token. ANT Token is not responsible for any risks, liabilities, losses or expenses incurred as a result of your trading activities.
 4. During the course of the transaction, you should judge whether the other party is a fully civil servant and decide whether to trade or transfer the other party to the other party, and you bear all risks associated with it.
 5. During the transfer process, if there is a similar information such as “transaction failure”, “package timeout”, etc., you should reconfirm through the official route of the relevant blockchain system or other blockchain query tools. Avoid repeated transfers; otherwise, all losses and expenses resulting from this shall be borne by you.
 6. You understand that when you create or import a wallet on an ANT Token, your Keystore, private key, mnemonic, etc. are only stored on the current mobile device and are not stored on the ANT Token or our server. You can replace your mobile device with a sync wallet, etc., following the instructions provided by ANT Token. However, if you do not save or back up your wallet password, private key, mnemonic, keystore, etc. and your mobile device is lost, your digital token will be lost and we will not be able to retrieve it for you. Corresponding losses. If you are leaking, exporting, or backing up your wallet password, private key, mnemonic, keystore, etc., or if the device or server that saved or backed up the above information is hacked or controlled, your digital token will So lost, we can it get it for you, you have to bear the corresponding losses.
 7. We recommend that you make a secure backup of your wallet is wallet password, private key, mnemonic, and keystore when creating or importing your wallet. We draw your attention, please do not use the following backup methods: screenshots, mail, notepad, SMS, WeChat, QQ and other electronic backup methods. We recommend that you copy information such as mnemonics and Keystore on a paper notebook, and you can also keep your electronic data in the password manager.
 8. We recommend that you use ANT Token in a secure network environment to ensure that your mobile device is not jailbroken or rooted to avoid potential security risks.
 9. Please be alert to the official fraud of non-ANT Token during the use of our services. Once you find such behavior, we encourage you to let us know as soon as possible.
 VI. Change, interruption or termination of service
Please copy and paste the keystore file to a safe, offline place to save. Do not save to email, notepad, web navigation, chat tools, etc., very dangerous.
The amount or the friend who received the red packet is not filled out

Private keys are the entrance to a digital wallet. Only private keys can prove that you are the owner of the assets in the wallet, and no one knows these private keys except you. This is the biggest difference between de centralization and centralization. Your digital assets are under your own control and there is no centralized institution involved.
 		Private key is a 32 byte random number generated by the Elliptic Curve Encryption algorithm. It consists of 64 hexadecimal characters, and a wallet has only one private key, which can not be modified. It is your only identity certificate on the chain. A private key can correspond to multiple public keys, and each public key can correspond to an address, which is changed by some mathematical logic through the public key. Conversely, it is impossible to deduce the private key when the address or public key is known, but when the private key is known, the public key and address can be deduced.
 		Block chains have the characteristics of "anonymity". There is no way to know the real information of the user who holds the address assets except that the user publicly acknowledges and proves that the private key of an address belongs to himself. There is absolutely no need to worry about privacy disclosure.
 		Mnemonic words are usually composed of 12 random words, in other words, mnemonic words are another form of private key. It converts 64 bit private keys into several common English words or vocabulary versions in other languages through algorithms.
 		You can understand mnemonics as different forms of private keys, need backup, and try to record them with paper notes when backing up. You can let your family keep one, keep one by themselves, do not save it on the network, such as cloud notes, chat records, etc. If you change your mobile phone, you can restore your wallet by backing up. You can import your wallet through mnemonics, but conversely, if someone else gets your mnemonics, you can transfer your assets, so keep your mnemonics properly.
 		If the private key loses or forgets the private key password, without backup mnemonics, it is equivalent to losing the only credentials. All assets in the address corresponding to the private key will be lost permanently. There is no way to transfer and trade, nor can assets be recovered by any external means.
 		Plaintext Private Key: 64 bit hexadecimal hash value string, with a sentence to illustrate the importance of plaintext private key: "Who has the private key, who has the right to use the wallet!" 
 		The world of block chain is still a little different from reality. For example, if you forget your bank card password, you can take your ID card to the bank and reset the password yourself. And the private key of the digital wallet, you forgot, and there is no backup mnemonic, then nobody can help you, contact customer service, provide mobile phone authentication code, wallet address and so on can not be retrieved, because this is a decentralized DAPP, will not store the user is private key, all private keys are stored only in the user is local.
 		You can test it on the same phone, or you can test it on another phone to verify that the backup is correct.
 		The same mobile phone import, if the original wallet exists, will tell you that the wallet already exists, indicating that the backup is correct.
 		Different mobile phone imports, can be imported successfully, although the name is different, but the address is the same, the instructions are also noted right.

ANT Token, is based on serving the real economy, empowering traditional industries, and using Token to connect merchants and users to form a major business alliance, bid farewell to the era of fighting alone and fighting alone. ANT is committed to creating a safe, efficient and transparent Token economic application system, which allows merchants and users to form a community of interests, and ultimately realizes that merchant products are not for sale. Users can purchase products with discounts and enjoy the mutual benefit of merchants dividends. Win mode. ANT is a communitybased organization that is shared, shared, and shared by all ANT Token holders and affiliates. The ANT Foundation was launched on September 1, 2018. On September 5, it submitted project white papers and non securitisation certificates and private equity provisions to the relevant departments of Singapore. It was officially approved on December 3, and was announced. Non profit organization. The ANT Foundation is committed to building a global business alliance, opening up a dual pass economy and empowering the physical industry. ANT Token: Serving the real economy, it is a proof of the rights of blockchain technology. It is committed to helping merchants not sell their products, and consumers are not spending money in the new economic system. ANT Coin: Focusing on the research and development of blockchain technology, it is committed to solving the problems of slow transfer of blockchain chain, monopoly of computing power, inconvenient storage, cumbersome transactions, and difficult landing. The ANT Coin main chain is issued with 5 billion pieces of equity mining and main node distribution, of which 39% 1.95 billion pieces of Chuangshi block predigging are issued in three phases through the recruitment of cofounders. The remainder is mined by pos mining and main node mining.
